<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
BELLS: Friends, now that we have recreated Annona's warp technology, I propose we create a warp receiver on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> at once!
2
1
BELLS: If we use the <color=orange>Sixth Location Locator</color> to track when the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> visits the sixth location, we could use a warp pad's alignment window to try to pinpoint the sixth location's exact position!
3
2
POKE: It pains me to say this, but we have already tried this, Bells. For reasons we do not know, a warp transmitter paired to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> acts as if it is constantly aligned with its target body.
4 3
POKE: That is to say, the warp transmitter allows one to warp at all times - making pinpointing the sixth location using the warp pad's alignment window impossible.
5
4
BELLS: Every time I believe we might finally be one step closer to our goal, the universe seems to imagine a new obstacle in our path..
6
5
BELLS: Like those supernatural winds that only appear at the sixth location, keeping us from escaping and seeing beyond the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon's</color> clouds... It feels like divine intent to keep us from our goal.
7
6
CLARY: Though it may feel that way at times, we must remain rational and logical, Bells.. Do not give up hope!
8
7
CLARY: Perhaps if we build a lab on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> to study these winds, we will be able to uncover why the sixth location alone has such strange and supernatural weather.
9
8
POKE: Clary is right! And even if it does not reveal a way around these obstacles, I am sure studying the sixth location's strange phenomena will deepen our understanding of this universe in some way.
10
9
BELLS: Your perspectives are filled with hope and wisdom, my friends.. Perhaps I have grown too fixated on this goal that has eluded our clan for so long.
11
10
BELLS: We shall build a lab on the top of the shrine on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> to study the sixth location's supernatural winds, and construct a new warp tower connected to this structure.
12
11
BELLS: Though I am sure the winds will be unbearable at this height, I know of an invention Kousa once engineered to protect our friends on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep</color> from the planet's strong winds.
13
12
BELLS: If we fortify the lab with this same technology, we may be able to create a space safe enough to study these winds directly.
